commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Whaaat?! You guys went to Harajuku? That's no fair! I wanted to go too!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: S-Sorry, did you want to go that badly? We should have got you some souvenirs.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Ugh, I didn't want souvenirs. You should hang out with me!

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: Hehe, I'm jealous, too. I'd love to go out somewhere with you. It was so much fun when we went to the park.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Me, too. We always do club stuff together, but it'd be nice to go hang out like old times again.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Okay, the four of us will go next time. I want to get to know everyone better for my song writing. Show me how you usually are.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: How we usually are?

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Oh! Then how about a sleepover!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: We'll eat together, bathe together, then have a pajama party. It'll be a great chance for you to see the real me!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: A sleepover?

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Great idea, Kasumi! I'm all for it!

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Right guys?! Emma, you think so too, right?

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: Me? Umm... Yeah, I guess so. A sleepover with everyone seems fun.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: So we're all for it, how about you?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: A sleepover, huh. Sounds fun.

commands.speaker: Everyone
commands.line: Woo hoo!

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: Thanks for the bath. That felt great.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Did you find the shampoo?

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: Yeah, I did. Japanese bath culture is so relaxing.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Aww, I wanted to go in the bath with everyone.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: We can go to a big bath or something together next time.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: We used to take a bath together sometimes, remember?

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Wait, you guys did? You're so lucky, Ayumu!

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Hehe, it was when we were kids.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: I want to take a bath with everyone like we're on a school trip!

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Yeah, it's fun bathing with everyone. Rinsing off each other's backs and stuff!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: That sounds so fun! I want to try!

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: We'll have a bath brigade some other time. For today, let's have fun with our pajama party!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: We have plenty of snacks, and look at all these school idol DVDs.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Woo! Awesome! Can I open the snacks?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Yeah, have whatever you want.

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: I'm going to put the DVD in.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: This is the School Idol Festival concert from last year. Whoa.

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: It's amazing, isn't it? We're going to be on that main stage this year.

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: Uh-oh, I'm starting to get nervous.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Now that I think of it, why did you come all the way to Japan to become an idol, Emma?

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: I saw a Japanese school idol a long time ago and just thought that I wanted to do that, too.

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: I looked up everything I could about it and studied hard so I could go to a Japanese high school.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: It's incredible that you came all the way to a different country. Which group did you see?

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: I can get the video right now. It's just on my phone, so the screen's a little small. Here, this is it.

commands.speaker: Everyone
commands.line: Whoa!

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: I found it back when I had to spend the night all alone. I was too scared and lonely to sleep, so I was watching videos all night. Oh, the memories.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Wow, I can see how this is so memorable.

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: Right? It made me want to be just like them and leave the audience feeling moved.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: You can definitely do it, Emma!

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: *Chuckle* Thanks. I'm counting on you to help me get there.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Hey Kasumi, why are you trying to be a school idol?

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Because I'm so cute!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: It's only right for someone as pretty and cute as me to become a school idol. It's good for everyone in the world!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Your performances are super cute. I love them.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: You do?! Do you like me the best out of everyone in the club?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: I love everyone the most!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: What? Can't you just like me the best? *Sniff*

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Kasumi, don't cry! I love you, too!

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: Me too, Kasumi!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Ayumu and Emma said they love me the best! You hear that?

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Please, give me your vote, too. If you don't love me the best, I'll hate you!

commands.speaker: Everyone
commands.line: Zzz... Zzz...

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Mm, this is a good melody.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Mmm...

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: (Did I wake her up?)

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Love me...the most... *Snore*

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: (She's just talking in her sleep. Sleepovers sure are fun.)

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: (I had plenty of sleepovers with Ayumu, but it's so much fun with more people. I want to go somewhere with everyone this summer, too.)

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: (Now I know why Emma and Kasumi wanted to become school idols. I want to keep this going and get to know everyone a little better.)
